front.title: PT-EAP: Posture Transport (PT) Protocol For EAP Tunnel Methods

abstract.t: This document specifies PT-EAP, an EAP based Posture Transport (PT) protocol designed to be used only inside TLS protected tunnel method. As such, the document also describes the intended applicability of PT-EAP as well as the evaluation against the requirements defined in the NEA Requirements and PB-TNC specifications.
